name: Bogost-in-the-shell
tagline: A Unity game for the Idle Thumbs "Wizard Jam"
body:
#Concept
A Unity game for the Idle Thumbs "Wizard Jam"  

Bogost In The Shell is a game were you are a weird floating orb, some might call it a Bogost. 
Your goal is to survive as long as possible while endless waves of Big Dogs attack you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
